name: Magnite Crysal Tractor Beam Array
text: After the end of your activation, you may exhaust this card to choose 1 enemy ship at distance 1-5. That ship's speed is increased or decreased to match your speed. While your speed is 0, you cannot ready this card.

name: Orbital Bombardment Particle Cannons
text: [Ignition (Long)] [Ignition], Red [Critical Hit]: Each other ship at distance 1 of the defender suffers 2 damage, and each squadron at distance 1 of the defender suffers 1 damage.

name: Superheavy Composite Beam Turbolasers
text: [Ignition (Medium)] [Ignition], Red [Critical Hit]: The defender suffers 1 damage. This occurs once for each red or blue [Critical Hit] icon in the pool.
